product_name: White Sierra Kool Sun Hat - Special Buy
long_description: When traveling or camping in hot, sunny and buggy regions, wear the White Sierra Kool Sun Hat. It's got an extra-wide brim, built-in sun protection and Insect Shield(R) to repel pesky biters. 100% soft peached nylon hat is very flexible and packs easily. Venting mesh lining wicks moisture away and dries quickly to keep you cool. 4.5 in. brim and integrated UVA/UVB protection help protect you from harmful solar rays. Insect Shield fabric repels mosquitoes (including those carrying West Nile virus and malaria), ticks, ants, flies, chiggers and midges or no-see-ums. Insect Shield uses permethrin which is a man-made version of a natural insect repellent found in a type of chrysanthemum plant; it's odorless and invisible. White Sierra Kool Sun Hat has an adjustable crown cord and chin strap, and stays on in the wind. Special buy.
short_description: When traveling or camping in hot, sunny and buggy regions, wear the White Sierra Kool Sun Hat. It's got an extra-wide brim, built-in sun protection and Insect Shield(R) to repel pesky biters.
